thread.title: Greece police seek man in slashing attack
thread.title_full: Greece police seek man in slashing attack

author: democratandchronicle.com
title: Greece police seek man in slashing attack
text:
The Greece Police Department is seeking a 24-year-old man who is accused of slashing an ex-girlfriend in the face during a fight. Andrew Fletcher, 24, allegedly cut the woman during an argument at 11:30 p.m. Sunday at a residence on Oakwood Drive. She went to the hospital with a non-life-threatening injury, according to the police.
Fletcher has ties to Rochester as well as Lockport, Niagara County. Anyone with information about where he might be should call 911.
